content: One of our clients said, âNo more repetitive reminders to staff, less phone calls to clients, more time spent giving spectacular client service.â Another one shared, âFrom allowing potential customers to book their own appointments to receiving payments to sending follow-up confirmation messages to reviews among many, many other aspects, I see Thryv benefiting my business in categories dang near across the board.â All these efforts culminate in our highest engagement numbers to date and corresponding low churn for the first half of the year.
